page.title: 09LIFE STYLES ASHBY MAGNA
page.content:
There is a mixture of both middle and working class families and there is an awareness of current fashion trends both in dress and interior house decoration.
Because of the lack of public transport most life styles are centred around car ownership since there is very little social activity within the area. There is only one shop situated in Peatling Parva selling vegetables and home produced cakes, but a number of mobile shops visit regularly.
Village based activities include the youth club, Women's Institute, keep fit classes, nursery school and toddlers club. The village pub serves food but is primarily concerned with attracting non residents.
